title: Presented by ULTA Beauty: A Prod Flirt and a Beauty Dabbler
itunes:title: Presented by ULTA Beauty: A Prod Flirt and a Beauty Dabbler
itunes:subtitle: This is a very special episode (with so many prod recs!) brought to you exclusively by ULTA Beauty.Kate and Doree love that ULTA Beauty agrees that skincare is about more than just the products you put on your skin. So, Kat and Dor take a hot second...
description:
This is a very special episode (with so many prod recs!) brought to you exclusively by ULTA Beauty.


Kate and Doree love that ULTA Beauty agrees that skincare is about more than just the products you put on your skin. So, Kat and Dor take a hot second to talk about learning to love the skin you’re in through their skincare journey, how they stumbled into a skincare routine, and, most excitingly, the many products they’ve come to love.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is presented by ULTA BEAUTY - The possibilities are beautiful. So shop skincare at ULTA Beauty now.  


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
